name: zops
description:
Follow us for updates  Instagram Twitter Facebook

ZOPS is a multiplayer top-down shooter inspired by Black ops 1 : dead ops arcade

Fight hordes of zombies, rack up as many kills as possible before your eaten alive.

Play the single player demo in your browser, merry x-mas :)

Controls

WASD or Arrows : Move

Mouse : Aim

Left Click : Shoot

Right Click : Kick zombies

Mouse Wheel : Zoom

E : Interact

This game is currently in development since December 13th 2019, drop in our discord to leave us suggestions, or just say hi and experience dev hell with us
